org.apache.giraph.graph

接口 VertexValueFactory<V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

  • 类型参数:
    V - Vertex value
    所有已知实现类:
    DefaultVertexValueFactory

    public interface VertexValueFactory<V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
    Factory class to create default vertex values. A user can extend this class in order to customize the creation of new vertex values when a vertex is created by the infrastructure (e.g., if edges for a vertex are read).

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      V createVertexValue()
      Create a new vertex value.
      void initialize(ImmutableClassesGiraphConfiguration<?,V,?,?> configuration)
      Initialize the factory from the configuration.

    • 方法详细资料

      • initialize

        void initialize(ImmutableClassesGiraphConfiguration<?,V,?,?> configuration)
        Initialize the factory from the configuration.
        参数:
        configuration - Configuration

      • createVertexValue

        V createVertexValue()
        Create a new vertex value.
        返回:
        New vertex value.
